description: In order to be able to use online banking, every customer must authorise themselves before being able to access their online banking account.
This procedure requires some basic steps, which are need to be executed every time you want to start a new online banking session.
steps: Click on the 'Log In' button located in the upper right corner of the website.
Enter the Customer Number "123456789" into the field with the caption "Customer number".
Enter the Password "testtest" into the field with the caption "Password".
Subsequently click on the "Log in" button located underneath the input fields to log in to the online banking system.

description: Learners have to recall the steps they took in the previous example: 1) Click on 'Log On' 2) Type in your credentials
Learners follow the step in the detailed walkthrough: 1) Click on 'Log On' 2) Type in your credentials
